name: Balls of Defense
description:
Balls of Defense is a Tower Defense Game where you Protect your Castle from being Attacked, Place Turrets, use Shops for Power ups, face Enemies. and Level up!

This is only a Prototype for a Tower Defense game, it is Unlikely to be Finished.

Game Made by: Alan Ray D'souza

Publisher: The Zeiner

Co-Developer: Yehia zein
